button.tooltip: Calibrate the selected route's measures from two or more calibration points with assigned measure values.

tool.caption: Define Line Portion
tool.tooltip: Define portion of the selected line feature to modify.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Define Line Portion
button.tooltip: Define portion of the selected line feature to modify.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Change Parcel Type
button.tooltip: Move the selected parcels to the parcel type chosen on the Change Parcel Type dialog box.Available only when there are selected parcels.

button.caption: Duplicate Parcels
button.tooltip: Duplicate the selected parcels to the parcel type chosen on the Duplicate Parcels dialog box.Available only when there is an active record set in the map and there are selected parcels.

button.caption: Set Historic
button.tooltip: Set the selected parcels, lines or points as historic. Selected parcel features will be retired by the active record.Available only when there is an active record in the map and parcels, lines or points are selected.

button.caption: Set Current
button.tooltip: Set the selected parcels, lines or points as current. Selected parcel features will no longer be retired by a record.Available only when historic parcels, lines or points are selected.

button.caption: Shrink To Seeds
button.tooltip: Replace the selected parcel polygons with seeds. Parcel lines can be edited or modified. Use Reconstruct From Seeds to rebuild the parcels after modfying lines.Available only when at least one parcel is selected.

button.caption: Reconstruct From Seeds
button.tooltip: Reconstruct parcels from lines enclosing seeds in the map extent. An active record is not required to reconstruct parcels. Use the Reconstruct From Seeds tool with the Shrink To Seeds tool to replace parcels with seeds, modify parcel lines and rebuild parcels.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

controls.button:
Copy the selected lines to the active record and chosen parcel type. Use the copied lines to build parcels in the active record.Available only when there is an active record in the map and line features are selected.
/>

button.caption: Create Seeds
button.tooltip: Create parcel seeds for closed loops of lines in the map extent. Seeds are only created for loops of lines associated with the active record. Seeds are used to build parcels from lines.Available only when there is an active record in the map.

button.caption: Build Extent
button.extendedCaption: Build parcels in the map extent.
button.tooltip: Build parcels from lines and seeds or polygons in the map extent. Build Extent creates missing parcel features. Build Extent can build up to 1,000 parcels in the map extent."Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Build Active
button.extendedCaption: Build parcels in the active record.
button.tooltip: Build parcels from lines and seeds or polygons in the active record. Build creates missing parcel features and associates them to the active record.Available only when there is an active record in the map.

button.caption: Delete Parcels
button.tooltip: Delete parcels in the parcel fabric. Deletes associated lines and points if they are not used by any other parcel, current or historic. If the Preserve field of a point is set to Yes, the point is not deleted.Available only when there are selected parcels.

button.caption: Transfer Parcel
button.tooltip: Transfer a parcel of land between source and target parcels.Available only when there is an active record in the map.

button.caption: Reconstruct Boundaries
button.tooltip: Create individual parcel lines for parcel edges and generate missing COGO dimensions.Available only when parcels are selected.

button.caption: Zoom To Active Record
button.tooltip: Zoom and pan the map to the active record.Available only when there is an active record set.

button.caption: Create Record
button.tooltip: Create a parcel fabric record. A record represents the legal document or land transaction that created the parcels. The record will be set as active in the map and new parcel features will be associated with the active record.

button.caption: Merge Collinear Boundaries
button.tooltip: Merge connected, collinear parcel lines into a single parcel line using an offset tolerance.Available only when there are selected parcel lines or connection lines.

button.caption: Merge Points
button.tooltip: Merge selected parcel fabric points to a chosen point. Lines between duplicate points are removed.

button.caption: Options
button.tooltip: Set additional options for displaying the parcel lineage.

tool.caption: Parcel Lineage
tool.tooltip: Display parcel lineage for the selected record. Parcel lineage is displayed in a Link Chart. Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Parcel Lineage
button.tooltip: Display parcel lineage for the selected record. Parcel lineage is displayed in a Link Chart.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Parcel Features
button.tooltip: Select the parcel features of the selected parcel polygons. Parcel lines and points will be added to the selection.Available only when parcel polygons are selected.

dynamicMenu.caption: Recently Used Records
dynamicMenu.tooltip: Select a recently used record and set it as active in the map. Available only when there is a history of recently used records.

tool.caption: Split

button.caption: Distance Distance

button.caption: Streaming
button.tooltip: Turn on stream mode editing so vertices are placed at an interval as you move around the map. Click the map to stop streaming temporarily, then click again to start creating vertices. Press O to access options.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Change Length
button.tooltip:
Extend or Trim the line to the specified length.
Trim: A positive value less than the line length measures the new length from the first vertex. A negative value less than the line length trims the specified length from the last vertex.
Extend: A positive value greater than the line length measures the new length from the first vertex. A negative value greater than than the line length measures the new length from the last vertex

button.caption: Calculate Field
button.extendedCaption: Calculate field values within a table.
button.tooltip: Set the values of this field by specifying a calculation expression. If any of the rows in the table are currently selected, only the values of the selected rows will be calculated.The project has unsaved edits, there is no field selected, or the table is read only.

button.caption: Calculate Geometry
button.extendedCaption: Calculate geometry values within a table.
button.tooltip: Set the values of this field by specifying a geometry property of the features, such as x-coordinate, y-coordinate, length, area, or number of vertices. If any of the rows in the table are currently selected, only the values of the selected rows will be calculated.This table or field does not support Calculate Geometry.

button.caption: Summarize

button.caption: Remove Overlap
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Remove Overlap Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Remove the overlapping portion of the feature that is causing the error.

button.caption: Remove Segment
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Remove Segment Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Remove the segment of the line feature that is causing the error. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Create Feature
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Create Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Create a new feature from the error shape. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Merge
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB TopologyMerge Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Merge the overlap into one feature and remove it from the others. Choose which feature receives the overlapping portion on the dialog box that appears. This fix can be applied to one error only.

button.caption: Merge to Largest
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Merge to Largest Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Merge the shortest line into the longest line, retaining the attributes of the longest line feature. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Delete Feature
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Delete Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Delete the feature causing the topology error. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Split
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Split Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Split the features where they intersect. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Extend
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Extend Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Extend the line to snap to the nearest line feature within the specified distance. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Trim
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Trim Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Trim the line to the nearest intersecting line feature within the specified distance. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Snap
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Snap Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Snap the dangling line feature to the nearest line within the specified tolerance. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Simplify
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Simplify Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Remove self-overlapping or self-intersecting line segments from the feature causing the error. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.Coming Soon

button.caption: Explode
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Explode Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Create a separate feature for each part of the multipart feature. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: No Fix Available
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology No Fix Method
button.tooltip: A predefined topology solution is not available. Use other tools to fix the error.

button.tooltip: Mark an error as an exception.

button.caption: Show Only Active
button.tooltip: Show only parcels in the active record. Show only Active can be turned on or off. If Show Only Active is turned off, you can set the transparency of parcels that are not part of the active record. Available only when an active record is set and Transparency is turned off.

button.caption: Show Only Active On
button.tooltip: Show only parcels in the active record. Show only Active can be turned on or off. If Show Only Active is turned off, you can set the transparency of parcels that are not part of the active record. Available only when an active record is set and Transparency is turned off.

button.caption: Show Only Active Off
button.tooltip: Click to stop showing only parcels in the active record. If Show Only Active is toggled off, you can set the transparency of parcels that are not part of the active record.Available only when an active record is set.

customControl.tooltip: Click to toggle the active record on or off. If you are doing a record-driven workflow, toggle the active record on and choose the record to set as active. New parcels are added to the active record.

customControl.caption: Parcel Record Effects
customControl.tooltip: Set the transparency of parcel features that are not part of the active record.Available only when an active record is set and Show only Active is turned off.

button.caption: Align Parcels
button.tooltip: Select and align parcels using alignment links generated in an alignment buffer.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Align Parcels
button.tooltip: Show the Align Parcels pane. This allows you to make adjacent parcels coincident using an alignment tolerance and links.

button.caption: esri_editing_ToggleCreateLinks
button.tooltip: Toggle Create Links Method

tool.caption: Create Parcel Link
tool.tooltip: Create parcel links by two points or within rectangle.

tool.caption: Create Links By Rectangle
tool.tooltip: Create parcel links within rectangle.

tool.caption: Delete Links And Anchor Points
tool.tooltip: Deletes Alignment Links And Anchor Points.

tool.caption: Show
tool.tooltip: Click to display the alignment tolerance buffer. The display of the alignment tolerance buffer can be toggled on or off.

button.caption: Switch
button.tooltip: Switch parcel selection.Available only when there are selected parcels or parcel lines.

button.caption: Align Features
button.tooltip: Align Features closes gaps between adjacent polyline or polygon features using a traced line and a buffer tolerance.

button.caption: Highlight
button.tooltip: Highlight gaps and overlaps for the chosen parcel layer in the current map extent. Gaps and overlaps that are larger than the provided Maximum Width will be highlighted in the specified colors.This command is currently unavailable. Available only when required settings have been chosen. Click the dropdown arrow to choose what layer to use and whether to highlight gaps, overlaps or both.

button.caption: Clear
button.tooltip: Clear highlighted gaps and overlaps in the dashed-line extent boundary.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

tool.caption: Select Parcels
tool.tooltip: Select one or more parcels.

tool.caption: Merge Parcel Points
tool.tooltip: Select one or more parcel points.

button.caption: Consistency Check
button.extendedCaption: Analyzes the parcel fabric measurement network by running a least-squares adjustment on the input parcels.
button.tooltip: Use a least-squares adjustment to check parcel line dimensions for blunders and outliers. Adjustment results are stored in adjustment layers that are added to the map.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Weighted
button.extendedCaption: Analyzes the parcel fabric measurement network by running a least-squares adjustment on the input parcels.
button.tooltip: Use a least-squares adjustment with control points to estimate updated coordinates for points. Adjustment results are stored in adjustment layers that are added to the map.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Apply
button.extendedCaption: Applies the results of a least squares adjustment to parcel fabric feature classes.
button.tooltip: Apply the adjustment results stored in adjustment layers to parcel fabric feature classes.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Switch Gallery Size
button.tooltip: Switch between small and large icons.

button.caption: Customize
button.tooltip: Add groups, reorder, or remove the tools in the Tool gallery.

button.caption: Switch Gallery Size
button.tooltip: Switch between small and large icons.

button.caption: Customize
button.tooltip: Add groups, reorder, or remove the tools in the Tool gallery.

button.caption: Zoom To Records
button.tooltip: Zoom and pan the map to the selected records.

button.caption: Pan To Records
button.tooltip: Pan the map to the selected records.

button.caption: Select Records
button.tooltip: Select the records in the map.

button.caption: Attribute Table Showing Selection
button.tooltip: Open and select the records in the attribute table.

button.caption: Manage Attachments
button.extendedCaption: Open Attachments Manager for the selected record.
button.tooltip: Open Attachments Manager.Available only when attachments have been enabled and there is one record selected.

button.caption: Set Active Record
button.tooltip: Click to toggle the active record on or off. If you are doing a record-driven workflow, toggle the active record on and choose the record to set as active. New parcels are added to the active record.More than one record is selected. Select only one record.

button.caption: Select Features In Records
button.tooltip: Click to select all features in the selected records.

button.caption: Assign Selection To Record
button.tooltip: Assign the selected parcel features to the selected record.No parcel features are selected or more than one record is selected. Select at least one parcel feature and only one record.

button.caption: Delete Records
button.tooltip: Delete the selected records. Parcels associated with the records are not deleted.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show record properties.More than one record is selected. Select only one record.

button.caption: Manage Records
button.tooltip: Search for records and set a record as active in the map.Available only when there is a parcel fabric in the map.

button.caption: Activate Record of Selected Feature
button.tooltip: Set the record of the selected feature as the active record in the map.Available only when there are selected parcel features in the map (points, lines, polygons).

button.caption: Zoom To Record
button.tooltip: Zoom and pan the map to the active record.Available only when there is an active record set.

button.caption: Pan To Record
button.tooltip: Pan the map to the active record.Available only when there is an active record set.

button.caption: Select Record
button.tooltip: Select the active record polygon in the map.Available only when there is an active record set for the map.

button.caption: All
button.tooltip: Select all the features in the active record.Available only when an active record is set in the map.

button.caption: Polygons
button.tooltip: Select polygon features in the active record.Available only when an active record is set in the map.

button.caption: Lines
button.tooltip: Select line features in the active record.Available only when an active record is set in the map.

button.caption: Points
button.tooltip: Select point features in the active record.Available only when an active record is set in the map.

button.caption: Connection Lines

tooltip.heading: Select Connection line Features In Record

button.tooltip: Select connection line features in the active record.Available only when an active record is set in the map.

button.caption: Assign Selection To Record
button.tooltip: Assign the selected parcel features to the active record.No parcel features are selected or there is no active record set. Select at least one parcel feature and set an active record.

button.caption: Manage Attachments
button.extendedCaption: Open Attachments Manager for the active record.
button.tooltip: Open Attachments Manager.Available only when attachments have been enabled and there is an active record in the map.

button.caption: Record Properties
button.tooltip: Display the attributes of the active record.Available only when there is an active record set for the map.

button.caption: Options
button.tooltip: Set options for displaying the active record control and for displaying record extent warnings.Available only when there are selected parcels.
